entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:25 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
